mapper.insert: INSERT INTO tbl_club_member ( club_id, user_no, role, joined_at ) VALUES ( #{club_id}, #{user_no}, #{role}, NOW() )
mapper.select: SELECT m.club_id, m.user_no, m.role, m.joined_at, m.left_at, u.user_name, u.user_birth, u.user_phone FROM tbl_club_member m JOIN user u ON m.user_no = u.user_no WHERE m.club_id = #{club_id} ORDER BY m.joined_at ASC

SELECT m.club_id, m.user_no, m.role, m.joined_at, m.left_at, u.user_name, u.user_birth, u.user_phone FROM tbl_club_member m JOIN user u ON m.user_no = u.user_no WHERE m.club_id = #{club_id} AND m.user_no = #{user_no} LIMIT 1
